title: Confirm player pairings for first round
custom_preconds: GIVEN the eight players for the derby are known
custom_steps: WHEN the bracket is populated with the eight players
custom_expected: THEN four pairs of players are displayed for the first round

title: Confirm player pairings for second round
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the first round has completed
AND the four winning players are known
custom_steps: WHEN the bracket is populated with the four winning players for the second round
custom_expected: THEN two pairs of players are displayed for the second round

title: Confirm player pairings for third round
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the second round has completed
AND the two winning players are known
custom_steps: WHEN the bracket is populated with the two winning players for the third round
custom_expected: THEN one pair of players is displayed for the third round

title: Confirm round winner advances to subsequent round
custom_preconds: GIVEN two players are competing in a round
custom_steps: WHEN a player has defeated his opponent
custom_expected: THEN the player advances to the next round and/or wins the competition

title: Batter headshots link to player cards
custom_expected: THEN the player card is displayed

title: Pre-game tracker display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to https://www.mlb.com 
AND HRD is pre-game
custom_expected:
THEN the copy "Starts at 7:05 PM ET" is displayed
AND players matchups are displayed

title: Pre-game batter cell
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to https://www.mlb.com 
AND HRD is pre-game
custom_expected:
THEN the batter cell displays:
Seed number
First name - last name
Team abbrev
2017 home run total
2017 top exit velocity

title: Batter headshots link to player cards
custom_expected: THEN the player card is displayed

title: Live batter cell
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to https://www.mlb.com 
AND HRD is live
custom_expected:
THEN the batter cell displays:
-Active/new matchups as the top row
-Seed number
-First name - last name
-Team abbrev

Batter stats:
--Top derby HR distance & Top derby exit velocity
---If a batter has not yet hit a home run, show a dash ("—") for the data label
----For example: "Top Distance —"
---If a batter matchup has not yet started (i.e., 1-8 is batting and 2-7 is waiting), don't show anything on the right side of the cell

--Total round home runs
---Show "0 HR" when a batter stats batting but has not yet hit a HR

-The on-deck batter should say "On Deck"

-When both batters in a given matchup are done, change the coloring to reflect the winner (black) and loser (grey)

title: Batter cell for active round is highlighted
custom_expected: THEN the active batter cell is highlighted in T-Mobile magenta

title: Clock is in sync with Stringer
Batter headshots link to player cards
custom_expected: THEN the player card is displayed

title: Final tracker display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to https://www.mlb.com
AND the HRD is over
custom_expected: THEN the text "2017 Home Run Derby Winner!" is displayed over the winning batter

title: Final batter cell
custom_preconds:
GIVEN navigation to https://www.mlb.com 
AND HRD is over
custom_expected:
THEN the batter cell displays:
-Seed number
-First name - last name
-Team abbrev

Batter stats:
--Top derby HR distance & Top derby exit velocity
---If a batter has not yet hit a home run, show a dash ("—") for the data label
----For example: "Top Distance —"

--Total round home runs
---Show "0 HR" when a batter stats batting but has not yet hit a HR

-When both batters in a given matchup are done, change the coloring to reflect the winner (black) and loser (grey)

title: Batter cell for winner is highlighted
custom_expected: THEN the winning batter cell is highlighted in T-Mobile magenta

title: Confirm tracker defaults to final round
custom_expected: THEN the tracker defaults to display the final round

title: Confirm round 1 and round 2 remain accessible
"2019 Home Run Derby Winner" text appears in place of Finals bracket
Tracker maintains width with video player
custom_expected: THEN the tracker maintains the same width as the video player

title: Clock module is hidden
custom_expected: THEN the clock module is hidden for all states

title: Watch button is hidden
custom_expected: THEN a Watch button is not displayed for all states

title: Hide Spoilers button is available
IF Hide Spoilers is selected then this should be hidden:
custom_steps: WHEN user selects to hide spoilers
custom_expected:
THEN the following should be hidden
- Top Distance
- Top Exit Velocity
- Home Runs Total
- Ball placements on tracker
- Last HR info (Distance, Exit Velocity, Launch Angle)

title: Show Spoilers button is available
Batter headshots link to player cards
custom_expected: THEN the player card is displayed

title: Confirm all ball placements appear on tracker
Confirm player pairings for first round
custom_preconds: GIVEN the eight players for the derby are known
custom_steps: WHEN the bracket is populated with the eight players
custom_expected: THEN four pairs of players are displayed for the first round

custom_expected: THEN two pairs of players are displayed for the second round

title: Confirm round time is four minutes
custom_expected: THEN the clock will countdown from four minutes

title: Confirm round bonus time (30 seconds) is awarded when applicable
custom_steps: WHEN a player hits two home runs that measure 440ft or more
custom_expected: THEN 30 seconds is added to the clock

title: Confirm round bonus time (30 seconds) is awarded once per player per round
custom_steps:
WHEN a player hits two home runs that measure 440ft or more
AND 30 seconds of bonus time has been awarded
AND a player hits two more home runs that measure 440ft or more
custom_expected: THEN no additional bonus time is awarded for the player for the round

title: Confirm each player is eligible for a 45 second time-out in round 1
custom_steps: WHEN a player requests a time out
custom_expected: THEN the player is allowed one 45 second time-out for round 1

title: Confirm each player is eligible for a 45 second time-out in round 2
custom_steps: WHEN a player requests a time out
custom_expected: THEN the player is allowed one 45 second time-out for round 2

title: Confirm each player is eligible for two 45 second time-outs in round 3
custom_steps: WHEN a player requests a time out
custom_expected:
THEN the player is allowed one 45 second time-out for round 3
AND allowed a second 45 second time-out for round 3

title: Confirm round winner advances to subsequent round
custom_preconds: GIVEN two players are competing in a round
custom_steps: WHEN a player has defeated his opponent
custom_expected: THEN the player advances to the next round and/or wins the competition

title: Confirm all ball placements appear on tracker
Confirm swing-off is initiated for a tie in round 1
custom_preconds: GIVEN two batters are competing in round 1
custom_expected: THEN a swing-off will commence

title: Confirm swing-off is initiated for a tie in round 2
custom_preconds: GIVEN two batters are competing in round 2
custom_expected: THEN a swing-off will commence

title: Confirm swing-off is initiated for a tie in round 3
custom_preconds: GIVEN two batters are competing in round 3
custom_expected: THEN a swing-off will commence

title: Confirm round time is one minute
custom_expected: THEN the clock will countdown from one minute

title: Confirm bonus time is not awarded during the swing-off
custom_steps: WHEN a player hits two home runs that measure 440ft or more
custom_expected: THEN 30 seconds is NOT added to the clock

title: Confirm a swing-off tie results in a 3 pitch round
custom_preconds: GIVEN a swing-off is taking place between two players
custom_steps: WHEN a tie results for the swing-off
custom_expected: THEN each player will swing at three pitches to break the tie

title: Confirm a swing-off (3 pitch tiebreaker) results in a sudden death round
custom_preconds: GIVEN a swing-off (3 pitch tiebreaker) is taking place between two players
custom_steps: WHEN a tie results for the swing-off (3 pitch tiebreaker)
custom_expected: THEN each player will swing at a single pitch in a sudden death round

title: Tabs are available for three rounds
custom_expected: THEN three round tabs are displayed

title: User can navigate to previous round
custom_preconds: GIVEN derby rounds have been completed
custom_expected:
THEN current rounds
AND previous rounds can be accessed

title: User cannot navigate to future round
custom_preconds: GIVEN none or some derby rounds have been completed
custom_expected: THEN future rounds are greyed out and not accessible

title: Tab defaults to first tab prior to Derby start
custom_preconds: GIVEN the derby has not started
custom_expected: THEN the tabset defaults to the first tab

title: Tab defaults to current tab during Derby
custom_expected: THEN the tabset defaults to current round

title: Tab defaults to third tab at Derby conclusion
custom_expected: THEN the tabset defaults to the third tab

title: "See More" button links to HRD VTP - NO LONGER RELEVANT WITHOUT MOBILE/WEB TRACKER
custom_expected: THEN the VTP for the HRD is displayed

title: HRD link should appear and link on Club Schedule pages
Confirm web views from News Section
Confirm web views from banner ads
